name: PupThief
description:
You and your puppy were chilling on a regular day. That very day, while Masked Dude was touring your planet, he saw your puppy and was instantly obsessed (duh). 

He stole your baby doggo while you were snoozing and shattered your world. 

Journey through five realms of villains, traps and despair in this MiniGame and win back your puppy!
